description: Cups Color is a fun and addicting water sorting puzzle game. The concept is simple - you have to pour colored water from one glass/cup into another of the same color. However, the various mechanics and level designs keep the puzzles challenging and engaging.
name: Cups Color - Water Sort Puzzle
